mapper.sql: ID, OUT_OID, REG_OID,SERVICE_OID, CASE_NUMBER, APPLY_USER_NAME, SERVICE_TYPE_NAME, CARD_NUMBER, CASE_CREATE_DATE, MATERIAL_OIDS,SELECT_MATERIAL_OIDS, OUT_STATUS, OUT_STOCK_DATE, OUT_STOCK_USER, OUT_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, CASE_CREATE_USER_OID, OUT_TYPE, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_PHONE, KD_COMPANY, KD_CODE, SENDER_USER_NAME, SENDER_USER_PHONE, ID_CARD
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_case_material_out_of_stock
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_case_material_out_of_stock (ID, OUT_OID, REG_OID,SERVICE_OID, CASE_NUMBER, APPLY_USER_NAME, SERVICE_TYPE_NAME, CARD_NUMBER, CASE_CREATE_DATE, MATERIAL_OIDS,SELECT_MATERIAL_OIDS, OUT_STATUS, OUT_STOCK_DATE, OUT_STOCK_USER, OUT_USER_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, CASE_CREATE_USER_OID, OUT_TYPE, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_PHONE, KD_COMPANY, KD_CODE, SENDER_USER_NAME, SENDER_USER_PHONE, ID_CARD) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{serviceOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{materialOids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectMaterialOids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outStockDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outStockUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{caseCreateUserOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kdCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderUserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

#{outOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{regOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serviceOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{caseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{caseCreateUserOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{outType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{kdCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select distinct ID, OUT_OID, REG_OID,SERVICE_OID, CASE_NUMBER, APPLY_USER_NAME, SERVICE_TYPE_NAME, CARD_NUMBER,OUT_STATUS, CASE_CREATE_DATE, ID_CARD from t_case_material_out_of_stock where 1=1
AND REG_OID = #{regOid}
and OUT_STATUS = #{outStatus}
and OUT_STATUS in ('1','2')
and CASE_NUMBER like concat(#{caseNumber}, '%')
and APPLY_USER_NAME like concat(#{applyUserName}, '%')
AND CASE_CREATE_DATE >= str_to_date( #{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND CASE_CREATE_DATE <= str_to_date( #{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and SERVICE_OID in
#{serviceOid}
order by CASE_CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update:
update t_case_material_out_of_stock
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OUT_OID = #{record.outOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_OID = #{record.regOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_OID = #{record.serviceOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_NUMBER = #{record.caseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_USER_NAME = #{record.applyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_TYPE_NAME = #{record.serviceTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_NUMBER = #{record.cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_CREATE_DATE = #{record.caseCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MATERIAL_OIDS = #{record.materialOids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECT_MATERIAL_OIDS = #{record.selectMaterialOids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_STATUS = #{record.outStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_STOCK_DATE = #{record.outStockDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OUT_STOCK_USER = #{record.outStockUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_USER_NAME = #{record.outUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_DATE = #{record.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CASE_CREATE_USER_OID = #{record.caseCreateUserOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_TYPE = #{record.outType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RECEIVER_NAME = #{record.receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVER_PHONE = #{record.receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KD_COMPANY = #{record.kdCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KD_CODE = #{record.kdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SENDER_USER_NAME = #{record.senderUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SENDER_USER_PHONE = #{record.senderUserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD = #{record.idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
